Scorponok noticed that no one noticed him as they left his lab. He 
walked over and picked up his laptop and Mind erasing machine. "Ahh 
wheres the Minderasing machine???" Scorponok opens up his laptop and 
starts to press a few buttons. Soon the Mind Erasing Machine, that 
Volius was holding, started to shake.
